definitions.definition: a newspaper or magazine that deals with a particular subject or professional activity.
a daily record of news and events of a personal nature; a diary.
examples: diary, daily record, daybook, log, logbook, chronicle; daytimer he keeps a journal

definitions.definition: a record of the daily proceedings in the British Houses of Parliament.
examples: plural noun: Journals; plural noun: the Journals

definitions.definition: (in bookkeeping) a daily record of business transactions with a statement of the accounts to which each is to be debited and credited.
the part of a shaft or axle that rests on bearings.
